content: Confirmation bias is rampant for all tribal groups. Bludgeoning each other with scorched earth tactics and “do whatever it takes to win” has led to the death of civility, trust, and a willingness to wait and see how things evolve. We have crossed the Rubicon and one man’s factual information is another man’s fake news. Nothing is going to change the distrust that has been cultivated in our country, at this point, every one has picked sides and it is a fight to the finish between the tribes.
